short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage and categorize your Chrome extensions easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Extension Organizer" is a Chrome extension designed to help users manage and categorize their browser extensions efficiently. With features like customizable categories, the ability to toggle extensions on or off, and options for dark or light themes, this tool enhances productivity and streamlines your browsing experience. Perfect for those looking to keep their browser neat and organized.
